game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Retrieve the lost artifact from the Ruined Temple
game.description: An artifact of great power has been lost in the Ruined Temple. Your task is to navigate the temple's traps and retrieve it.

tasks.description: Find the entrance of the Ruined Temple and explore it
A powerful guardian protects the artifact. Defeat it to retrieve the artifact.
With the Guardian defeated, collect the artifact.
